Home

Menu

Advantages of Offshore Business Setup

Offshore company formation in Dubai offers enormous advantages for entrepreneurs and businessmen. Starting an offshore company provides confidentiality with stable economy and ensures highest level of safety measures. If you would like to know more about the various offshore company setup advantages offered by the United Arab Emirates, please get in touch with us.

  • Minimize tax obligations setting up offshore company can legally minimize the taxation of your business. Non-resident companies are often free from tax and enjoy various level of taxation depending on the country.
  • Low maintenance and setup cost - the procedures for setting up offshore company is relatively simple and fast. Establishment and maintenance requires lower cost when compared to other.
  • Easy transactions – offshore companies can easily create a safe and seamless environment for financial transactions within the jurisdiction and from all over the world.
  • Low capital and reduced administration – One of the key offshore company setup advantages is the requirement of low capital. The requirement for physical office can be overcome with virtual office services.

We work closely with all government agencies

Starting a business in Dubai. We can help you set up in a Freezone, on Mainland or Offshore.

Have a question? get in touch with us

Get started with your business needs, we reach out with free and qualified guidance​

Call us today : +971 56 408 6728

Why Us?

Customised Solutions
Experienced Consultants
Hassle-Free Procedure
Multiple Payment Options
